metadata.desc: Good old op flak gun. It was universally good before, common and useful for any strategy. Now, it serves mainly as a cheap beam support.
metadata.changelog:
Remade Flak Gun I (2 power, 4 projectiles, 18 sec charge time, 45 radius, 2 rarity, 65 scrap cost).
Lanius B: Adv. Flak removed. Ship starts with no weapons now.
